Title: Last x Test of x Resolve!
Writer: Joel McDonald (adr script adaptation), Yoshihiro Togashi (creator)
Actors: Megumi Han, Miyuki Sawashiro, Keiji Fujiwara, Mariya Ise
Plot: The group must spend the 50 hours Leorio gambled away in a confined room. Once they are out, they must decide by majority on which path to take: one takes 45 hours and allows all 5 to pass, the other takes is faster but only 3 can pass.
